Module.Content: <link type="text/css" href="http://apinyin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/apinyin.css" rel="stylesheet" rev="stylesheet" media="all" /> <textarea id="test-area" rows="5" style="width: 100%;"></textarea> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://apinyin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/jquery-1.3.2.min.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://apinyin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/pinyin-chs-table.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://apinyin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/allen-input-0.1.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://apinyin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/test.js"></script>
